description.english: Keep the Elephant 100% intact in Operation A, Mission 3
description.german: In Operation A, Mission 3 den Elephant zu 100 % intakt halten
description.french: Garder l'éléphant intact au cours de la mission 3 de l'opération A
description.italian: Mantieni l'Elephant integro al 100% nell'Operazione A, Missione 3.
description.spanish: Mantén el Elephant 100% intacto en la operación A, misión 3.
description.portuguese: Keep the Elephant 100% intact in Operation A, Mission 3
description.brazilian: Mantenha o Elephant 100% intacto na Operação A, Missão 3

description.english: Keep the Wraith 100% intact in Operation B, Mission 4
description.german: In Operation B, Mission 4 den Wraith zu 100 % intakt halten
description.french: Garder l'apparition intacte au cours de la mission 4 de l'opération B
description.italian: Mantieni il Wraith integro al 100% nell'Operazione B, Missione 4.
description.spanish: Mantén el Wraith 100% intacto en la operación B, misión 4.
description.portuguese: Keep the Wraith 100% intact in Operation B, Mission 4
description.brazilian: Mantenha o Wraith 100% intacto na Operação B, Missão 4

description.english: Do not allow the Watchers to resurrect any Knights in Operation C, Mission 4
description.german: In Operation C, Mission 4 die Beobachter keine Springer wiederbeleben lassen
description.french: Empêcher les sentinelles de ressusciter des chevaliers au cours de la mission 4 de l'opération C
description.italian: Non permettere agli Osservatori di rianimare alcun Cavaliere nell'Operazione C, Missione 4.
description.spanish: No permitas que los Watchers resuciten a ningún Caballero en la operación C, misión 4.
description.portuguese: Do not allow the Watchers to resurrect any Knights in Operation C, Mission 4
description.brazilian: Não permita que os Observadores ressuscitem qualquer Knight na Operação C, Missão 4

description.english: Complete Operation D, Mission 5 without getting hit by a Focus Turret
description.german: Operation D, Mission 5 abschließen, ohne von einem Fokus-Geschütz getroffen zu werden
description.french: Terminer la mission 5 de l'opération D sans être touché par une tourelle de précision
description.italian: Completa l'Operazione D, Missione 5 senza farti colpire da una torretta di precisione.
description.spanish: Completa la operación D, misión 5 sin que te impacte una torreta Focus.
description.portuguese: Complete Operation D, Mission 5 without getting hit by a Focus Turret
description.brazilian: Conclua a Operação D, Missão 5 sem ser atingido por uma Torreta de Foco

description.english: Do not get hit by any Proximity Mines in Operation E, Mission 2
description.german: In Operation E, Mission 2 von keinen Annäherungsminen getroffen werden
description.french: Éviter les mines au cours de la mission 2 de l'opération E
description.italian: Non farti colpire dalle mine di prossimità nell'Operazione E, Missione 2.
description.spanish: No seas impactado por ninguna mina de proximidad en la operación E, misión 2.
description.portuguese: Do not get hit by any Proximity Mines in Operation E, Mission 2
description.brazilian: Não seja atingido por qualquer mina de proximidade na Operação E, Missão 2

description.english: Earn your first Gold star
description.german: Ihren ersten goldenen Stern erhalten
description.french: Remporter votre première étoile d'or
description.italian: Ottieni la tua prima stella d'oro.
description.spanish: Consigue tu primera estrella de oro.
description.portuguese: Earn your first Gold star
description.brazilian: Ganhe sua primeira estrela de Ouro

description.english: Earn all Gold stars in Operations A through E
description.german: In den Operationen A bis E alle goldenen Sterne erhalten
description.french: Remporter toutes les étoiles d'or au cours des opérations A à E
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le stelle d'oro nelle Operazioni da A a E.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las estrellas de oro desde la operación A hasta la E.
description.portuguese: Earn all Gold stars in Operations A through E
description.brazilian: Ganhe todas as estrelas de Ouro na Operação A até E

description.english: Spend 10,000 credits on loadout upgrades
description.german: 10.000 Credits für Ausrüstungsupgrades ausgeben
description.french: Dépenser 10 000 crédits dans des améliorations de paquetage
description.italian: Spendi 10.000 crediti in potenziamenti per l'equipaggiamento.
description.spanish: Gasta 10 000 créditos en mejoras de equipamiento.
description.portuguese: Spend 10,000 credits on loadout upgrades
description.brazilian: Gaste 10.000 créditos em melhorias de arsenal

description.english: Use every Armor Ability at least once
description.german: Jede Panzerungsfähigkeit mindestens einmal einsetzen
description.french: Utiliser tous les power-ups d'armure au moins une fois
description.italian: Usa ogni abilità armatura almeno una volta.
description.spanish: Usa todas las habilidades de armadura al menos una vez.
description.portuguese: Use every Armor Ability at least once
description.brazilian: Use todas as Habilidades da Armadura pelo menos uma vez

description.english: Complete Operation A, Mission 6 with the Blind and Thunderstorm Skulls active
description.german: Operation A, Mission 6 mit aktivierten Schädeln 'Blind' und 'Gewitter' abschließen
description.french: Terminer la mission 6 de l'opération A avec les crânes Aveugle et Orage activés
description.italian: Completa l'Operazione A, Missione 6 con i teschi Accecato e Tempesta attivi.
description.spanish: Completa la operación A, misión 6 con las calaveras Ceguera y Tormenta eléctrica.
description.portuguese: Complete Operation A, Mission 6 with the Blind and Thunderstorm Skulls active
description.brazilian: Conclua a Operação A, Missão 6 com os Crânios Cego e Tempestade ativos

description.english: Complete Operation B, Mission 6 with the Hollow and Pacifist Skulls active
description.german: Operation B, Mission 6 mit aktivierten Schädeln 'Hohl' und 'Pazifist' abschließen
description.french: Terminer la mission 6 de l'opération B avec les crânes Désarmé et Pacifiste activés
description.italian: Completa l'Operazione B, Missione 6 con i teschi Vulnerabile e Pacifista attivi.
description.spanish: Completa la operación B, misión 6 con las calaveras Hueco y Pacifista activas.
description.portuguese: Complete Operation B, Mission 6 with the Hollow and Pacifist Skulls active
description.brazilian: Conclua a Operação B, Missão 6 com os Crânios Côncavo e Pacifista ativos

description.english: Complete Operation C, Mission 6 with the Black Eye and Pacifist Skulls active
description.german: Operation C, Mission 6 mit aktivierten Schädeln 'Blaues Auge' und 'Pazifist' abschließen
description.french: Terminer la mission 6 de l'opération C avec les crânes Œil noir et Pacifiste activés
description.italian: Completa l'Operazione C, Missione 6 con i teschi Occhio nero e Pacifista attivi.
description.spanish: Completa la operación C, misión 6 con las calaveras Ojo morado y Pacifista activas.
description.portuguese: Complete Operation C, Mission 6 with the Black Eye and Pacifist Skulls active
description.brazilian: Conclua a Operação C, Missão 6 com os Crânios Olho Roxo e Pacifista ativos

description.english: Complete Operation D, Mission 6 with the Famine and Thunderstorm Skulls active
description.german: Operation D, Mission 6 mit aktivierten Schädeln 'Hungersnot' und 'Gewitter' abschließen
description.french: Terminer la mission 6 de l'opération D avec les crânes Famine et Orage activés
description.italian: Completa l'Operazione D, Missione 6 con i teschi Carestia e Tempesta attivi.
description.spanish: Completa la operación D, misión 6 con las calaveras Hambre y Tormenta eléctrica.
description.portuguese: Complete Operation D, Mission 6 with the Famine and Thunderstorm Skulls active
description.brazilian: Conclua a Operação D, Missão 6 com os Crânios de Fome e Tempestade ativos

description.english: Complete Operation E, Mission 6 with the Hollow and Black Eye Skulls active
description.german: Operation E, Mission 6 mit aktivierten Schädeln 'Hohl' und 'Blaues Auge' abschließen
description.french: Terminer la mission 6 de l'opération E avec les crânes Désarmé et Œil noir activés
description.italian: Completa l'Operazione E, Missione 6, con i teschi Vulnerabile e Occhio nero attivi.
description.spanish: Completa la operación E, misión 6 con las calaveras Hueco y Ojo morado activas.
description.portuguese: Complete Operation E, Mission 6 with the Hollow and Black Eye Skulls active
description.brazilian: Conclua a Operação E, Missão 6 com os Crânios Côncavo e Olho Roxo ativos

description.english: Complete all Assault Ops for Operations A through E
description.german: Alle Assault Ops der Operationen A bis E abschließen
